flawed_nl_solution:
Bobby ate 5 pancakes and his dog ate 7 so 5+7 = <<5+7=10>>10
The recipe makes 21 pancakes and 10 were eaten so 21-10 = <<21-10=11>>11 pancakes were left
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
